tripleplay.ui
Class Interface

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.ui.Interface

public class Interface
extends Object

The main class that integrates the Triple Play UI with a PlayN game. This class is mainly necessary to automatically validate hierarchies of Elements during each paint. Create an interface instance, create Root groups via the interface and add the Element.layers into your scene graph wherever you desire. Call update(float) and paint(float) from Game.update(float) and Game.paint(float) to render your interface.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Interface.Task
          A time based task that requires an update per frame.
static interface Interface.TaskHandle
          An object that can be used to remove a previously added task.

Constructor Detail

Interface

public Interface()
Method Detail

deferAction

public void deferAction(Runnable action)
Posts a runnable that will be executed after the next time the interface is validated. Processing deferred actions is not tremendously efficient, so don't call this every frame.

addTask

public Interface.TaskHandle addTask(Interface.Task task)
Adds a task that will henceforth be updated once per game update. If a task is added during the task update iteration, it will be updated for the first time on the following game update.

Returns:
a handle that will remove the task when invoked the first time. Subsequent invocations will do nothing

update

public void update(float delta)
Updates the elements in this interface. Must be called from Game.update(float).

paint

public void paint(float alpha)
"Paints" the elements in this interface. Must be called from Game.paint(float).

roots

public Iterable<Root> roots()
Returns an iterable over the current roots. Don't delete from this iterable!

animator

public Animator animator()
Returns an animator that can be used within the scope of this interface.

createRoot

public Root createRoot(Layout layout,
                       Stylesheet sheet)
Creates a root element with the specified layout and stylesheet.

createRoot

public Root createRoot(Layout layout,
                       Stylesheet sheet,
                       playn.core.GroupLayer parent)
Creates a root element with the specified layout and stylesheet and adds its layer to the specified parent.

addRoot

public Root addRoot(Root root)
Adds a root to this interface. The root must have been created with this interface and not be added to any other interfaces. Generally you should use createRoot(tripleplay.ui.Layout, tripleplay.ui.Stylesheet), but this method is exposed for callers with special needs.

removeRoot

public void removeRoot(Root root)
Removes the supplied root element from this interface. If the root's layer has a parent, the layer will be removed from the parent as well. This leaves the Root's layer in existence, so it may be used again. If you're done with the Root and all of the elements inside of it, call destroyRoot to free its resources.

destroyRoot

public void destroyRoot(Root root)
Removes the supplied root element from this interface and destroys its layer. Destroying the layer destroys the layers of all elements contained in the root as well. Use this method if you're done with the Root. If you'd like to reuse it, call removeRoot instead.
